tweet: Crikey, the old man pushing the old lady in the wheelchair is going faster than this bus...so much for me being on time for work
Unsure why sunglasses are needed on day like this & wearing them on the bus as well?! They are taking photos of themselves so makes sense
There's a heady smell of solvents in our reception...feel rather light headed now
I slept like a baby last night, woke up dribbling, sucking my thumb and realised I'd wet myself
Barclays on fleet at has had a refurb, looks more like a swedish studio flat than a bank
